statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerSatisfactionData;
SELECT customer_id, satisfaction_score FROM CustomerSatisfactionData;
SELECT survey_id, customer_id, satisfaction_score FROM CustomerSatisfactionData WHERE satisfaction_score > 3;
SELECT * FROM CustomerSatisfactionData WHERE survey_date >= '2020-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerSatisfactionData ORDER BY survey_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerSatisfactionData WHERE satisfaction_score > 3 ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(satisfaction_score) AS avg_score FROM CustomerSatisfactionData GROUP BY customer_id HAVING avg_score > 4;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS num_surveys FROM CustomerSatisfactionData GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY num_surveys DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT survey_id, customer_id, satisfaction_score, feedback_text, survey_date FROM CustomerSatisfactionData WHERE feedback_text IS NOT NULL;

SELECT customer_id, AVG(satisfaction_score) AS avg_score, MAX(satisfaction_score) AS max_score, MIN(satisfaction_score) AS min_score FROM CustomerSatisfactionData GROUP BY customer_id HAVING avg_score > 3 AND max_score < 5 ORDER BY avg_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM SurveyData WHERE survey_id = 'f4cf031c-5c3f-4018-aff7-8843eb32cf1a';
SELECT survey_id, customer_id, satisfaction_level FROM SurveyData WHERE satisfaction_level > 3 ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_text, response_time FROM FeedbackData WHERE response_time < 24;
SELECT customer_id, survey_date, satisfaction_level FROM SurveyData ORDER BY satisfaction_level DESC, survey_date ASC;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM FeedbackData WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM SurveyData WHERE satisfaction_level > 3 ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT survey_id, customer_id, survey_date FROM SurveyData WHERE satisfaction_level < 2 AND survey_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY satisfaction_level ASC, survey_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_date, response_time FROM FeedbackData WHERE response_time > 10 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;

SELECT * FROM SurveyData JOIN FeedbackData ON SurveyData.customer_id = FeedbackData.customer_id WHERE SurveyData.survey_date > '2021-06-01' ORDER BY FeedbackData.response_time ASC, SurveyData.satisfaction_level DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM FeedbackData WHERE LENGTH(feedback_text) > 50 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address, phone_number FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE email_address LIKE '%@gmail.com%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses ORDER BY survey_date DESC, satisfaction_score ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT response_id, customer_id, survey_date FROM survey_responses WHERE satisfaction_score > 3 AND customer_id = 101 ORDER BY survey_date LIMIT 5;

SELECT c.customer_name, c.email_address, f.comment_text FROM customers c JOIN feedback_comments f ON c.customer_id = f.response_id WHERE f.comment_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY c.customer_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT MAX(satisfaction_score) AS max_score, MIN(satisfaction_score) AS min_score FROM survey_responses;
SELECT COUNT(response_id) AS total_responses, AVG(satisfaction_score) AS avg_score FROM survey_responses WHERE survey_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT survey_id, survey_date FROM surveys WHERE survey_rating = 5;
SELECT feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE survey_id = 3;
SELECT customer_name, survey_date, result_value FROM customers c JOIN surveys s ON c.customer_id = s.customer_id JOIN survey_results sr ON s.survey_id = sr.survey_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT survey_id, survey_date, survey_rating FROM surveys ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE survey_id = 3;
SELECT customer_name, survey_date, result_value FROM customers JOIN surveys ON customers.customer_id = surveys.customer_id JOIN survey_results ON surveys.survey_id = survey_results.survey_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_surveys;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_profiles;
SELECT survey_id, satisfaction_score FROM customer_surveys WHERE satisfaction_score > 3;
SELECT customer_name, comment_text FROM customer_profiles INNER JOIN feedback_comments ON customer_profiles.customer_id = feedback_comments.customer_id;
SELECT survey_id, question_text FROM survey_questions ORDER BY question_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_surveys ORDER BY survey_date DESC, satisfaction_score DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_phone LIKE '%555%' AND customer_email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT survey_id, customer_id, survey_date FROM customer_surveys WHERE satisfaction_score > 8 ORDER BY survey_date ASC;
SELECT question_text, active FROM survey_questions WHERE question_type = 'Multiple Choice' AND active = TRUE;
SELECT f.comment_text, c.customer_name FROM feedback_comments f JOIN customer_profiles c ON f.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE f.comment_text IS NOT NULL;
